description: There is a kitchen on the image. On the right you can find a coral toaster, and there is a sink with a bowl located in the center. There is a gold bowl inside the sink. Probably, i need to clean the bowl or make toasts.

objects.name: chopsticks
objects.location: The chopsticks are located in the center of the image. They are inside a brown bowl. The bowl is in the sink. There are no other objects around.
objects.relationship: The chopsticks are inside the bowl

objects.name: sticker
objects.location: The sticker is located on the left side of the image, near the left arm of the robotic arm. The bounding box for the sticker is [320, 170, 363, 225].
objects.purpose: The purpose of the sticker is not clear from the image.
objects.relationship: The robotic arm is interacting with the sticker.

objects.name: window
objects.location: The window is located in the top left corner of the image. It is rectangular in shape and covers a significant portion of the image.
objects.purpose: To let light into the room and provide a view outside.

objects.name: window
objects.location: The window is located in the top left corner of the image. It is rectangular in shape and small in size.
objects.purpose: To let light into the room

objects.name: sink
objects.location: The sink is located in the center of the image. It's in front of the window. There are no objects around
objects.relationship: The sink is inside the washing machine

objects.name: bowl
objects.location: The bowl is located in the center of the image. It's in the sink. There are no objects around
objects.relationship: The bowl is inside the sink
